local Tool = script.Parent;
local stillEquipped = true function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

-- Ninja Staff --
local Tool = script.Parent local Staff = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local BoStaff = Tool.Handle:Clone() BoStaff.Name = "BoStaff"
BoStaff.CanCollide = false newBAV = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") newBAV.P = 100000 newBAV.maxTorque = Vector3.new(newBAV.P, newBAV.P, newBAV.P)
newBP = Instance.new("BodyPosition") newBP.P = 100000 newBP.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBP.P, newBP.P, newBP.P)
newBAV.Parent = BoStaff newBP.Parent = BoStaff
StaffUnequipped = false
-- Sounds local SlashSound = Tool.Handle.SlashSound local SpinSound = Tool.Handle.SpinSound
-- Animation local StaffSwing local StaffSlash
-- damage local damage = 0 local spinDamage = 1 local slashDamage = 30
function blow(hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm ~= nil then joint = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == Staff or joint.Part1 == Staff) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) print(damage) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1.0) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = Player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
function onActivated()
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
myHumanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not myHumanoid then return end
MyTorso = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if MyTorso ~= nil then --BoStaff.Transparency = 0 Staff.Transparency = 1 BoStaff.CFrame = Staff.CFrame BoStaff.Parent = Staff.Parent damage = spinDamage connection = BoStaff.Touched:connect(blow)
StaffSpin = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.StaffSpin6) StaffSpin:Play()
SpinSound:Play() --newBAV.Parent = BoStaff --newBP.Parent = BoStaff
-- vertical spin for i = 1, 25 do if not StaffUnequipped then theta = i*2*math.pi/25 BoStaff.BodyPosition.position = MyTorso.Position + math.cos(theta)*MyTorso.CFrame.lookVector + 2*math.sin(theta)*MyTorso.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(1, 0, 0)) BoStaff.BodyAngularVelocity.angularvelocity = MyTorso.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0, 0, 20)) wait(.1) end end
if not StaffUnequipped then StaffSpin:Play() end -- horizontal spin for i = 1, 25 do if not StaffUnequipped then theta = i*2*math.pi/25 BoStaff.BodyPosition.position = MyTorso.Position + math.cos(theta)*MyTorso.CFrame.lookVector + 2*math.sin(theta)*MyTorso.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(1, 0, 0)) BoStaff.BodyAngularVelocity.angularvelocity = MyTorso.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0, 20, 0)) wait(.1) end end
BoStaff.Parent = nil Staff.Transparency = 0 connection:disconnect() if not StaffUnequipped then connection = Staff.Touched:connect(blow) wait(0.1) Tool.Handle.Fire.Enabled = true damage = slashDamage StaffSlash = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.StaffSlash) StaffSlash:Play() SlashSound:Play() wait(0.5) if connection then connection:disconnect() end end end damage = 0 Tool.Enabled = true Tool.Handle.Fire.Enabled = false
end
function onEquippedLocal() StaffUnequipped = false BoStaff.Parent = nil end
function onUnequippedLocal() StaffUnequipped = true if StaffSlash then StaffSlash:Stop() end if SlashSound then SlashSound:Stop() end if StaffSpin then StaffSpin:Stop() end if SpinSound then SpinSound:Stop() end
Staff.Transparency = 0.0 BoStaff.Parent = nil
--if newBAV ~= nil then newBAV:Remove() end --if newBP ~= nil then newBP:Remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
